name: Cuentas Por Pagar Multimoneda
query:
select 
a.supplier as "Proveedor:Link/Customer:450", 
IFNULL(a.bill_no, '') as "Folio Proveedor::180",
a.posting_date as "Fecha:Date:120",
a.due_date as "Vencimiento:Date:120",
REPLACE(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),a.due_date),"-","") as "Días de Atraso:Float:",
IFNULL(a.name, 'TOTAL') as "Folio:Link/Purchase Invoice:120", 
a.grand_total as "Total Facturado:Currency:",
a.currency as "Moneda", 
(case when a.currency = 'USD' then NULL when a.currency = 'MXN' then (a.outstanding_amount) / 1 else a.currency end) as "Debe MXN:Currency:", 
(case when a.currency = 'MXN' then NULL when a.currency = 'USD' then (a.monto_pendiente) else a.currency end) as "Debe USD:Currency:"
from
`tabPurchase Invoice` a 
where a.posting_date >= %(a.from_date)s and a.posting_date <= %(a.to_date)s and a.status != 'PAID' and a.docstatus = 1
order by  REPLACE(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),a.due_date),"-","") desc
